javadoc: A branch in a parse tree, corresponding to the application of a production

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a branch from the given grammar and production

params.name: prod
params.comment: the production applied to create this branch

methods.javadoc:
Prepend a child to this branch
@param child the child
 
 Because LR parsers produce rightmost derivations, they necessarily populate the branches
 right to left. During reduction, each child is popped from the stack, traversing them in
 reverse order. This method prepends children so that when reduction is complete, the
 children are aligned to the corresponding symbols from the RHS of the production.
methods.name: addChild
methods.comment: Prepend a child to this branch

params.name: child
params.comment:
the child
 
 Because LR parsers produce rightmost derivations, they necessarily populate the branches
 right to left. During reduction, each child is popped from the stack, traversing them in
 reverse order. This method prepends children so that when reduction is complete, the
 children are aligned to the corresponding symbols from the RHS of the production.

methods.name: expects
methods.comment:
See what symbol is expected next
 
 The child added next must be associated with the token expected next.

methods.javadoc:
Check if the branch is full
@return true if every symbol on the RHS has a corresonding child
methods.name: isComplete
methods.comment: Check if the branch is full

return.comment: true if every symbol on the RHS has a corresonding child

methods.javadoc:
Get the production applied to create this branch
@return
methods.name: getProduction
methods.comment: Get the production applied to create this branch

methods.javadoc:
Get the list of children, indexed by corresponding symbol from the RHS
@return
methods.name: getSubstitutions
methods.comment: Get the list of children, indexed by corresponding symbol from the RHS

methods.name: getSubstitution
methods.comment: Get the ith child, corresponding to the ith symbol from the RHS

name: AssemblyParseBranch
comment: A branch in a parse tree, corresponding to the application of a production
